pages.title: Forge Energy Power Tap
pages.text: The Forge Energy Power Tap allows you to extract energy from a $(l:bigreactors/passive)passively cooled$(/l) Reactor. This Power Tap outputs energy using the Forge Energy $(l:bigreactors/powersystem)power system$(/l), meaning it can only be connected to pipes or machines that are compatible with that system.

Only one $(l:bigreactors/powersystem)power system$(/l) can be used for each Reactor, which means only one type of Power Tap can be utilized in a single Reactor build. The Power Tap is available in both $(l:bigreactors/passiveactiveparts)passive and active$(/l) forms.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Power system:$() Forge Energy
